name: The Charming Foxhole
description: This bitter and refreshing amaro-laced tequila cocktail from Aaron Joseph of Wit and Wisdom in Baltimore, MD gives a nod toward the Negroni

recipeInstructions.text: Add tequila, Aperol, Nonino, Cocchi Vermouth di Torino, and Peychaud's to a mixing glass. Fill 2/3 full with ice and stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a large grapefruit twist, and serve.
